biz.sudden.designCoordination.collaborativePlanning.service.communication
Interface CPSendMessageService

public interface CPSendMessageService

With the aid of this ServiceInterface it is possible to retrieve the inbox (of the user logged in) and to send a message to an other user. Further it is possible to send a Invitations to potential partners which are contained in an enterprise list

Author:
Thomas Feiner
